  function dpCSSSetMinWidth() {
	var elem = document.getElementById("divsinglecolumnminwidth");
	if (elem) {
                dpCSSSetElemWidth(elem);
	}
  }
  
  function dpCSSSetElemWidth(elem) {
      if (elem) {
         var clientWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth ? document.documentElement.clientWidth : document.body.clientWidth;
         elem.runtimeStyle.width = (clientWidth &lt; 920 ? '920px' : '100%' );
      }
  }
  
  if ( -1 != navigator.userAgent.indexOf("MSIE") ) {
      window.onresize = dpCSSSetMinWidth;
  }

  <script type="text/javascript">
   // =============================================================================
// Function Class: Show/Hide product promotions &amp; special offers link
// =============================================================================

function showElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'visible';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'block';
    }
  }
}
function hideElement(id) {
  var elm = document.getElementById(id);
  if (elm) {
    elm.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    if (elm.getAttribute('name') == 'heroQuickPromoDiv') {
      elm.style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
}
function showHideElement(h_id, div_id) {
  var hiddenTag = document.getElementById(h_id);
  if (hiddenTag) {
    showElement(div_id);
  } else {
    hideElement(div_id);
  }
}

    a=a.toLowerCase();
    var b=CSMReqs[a];

        if(typeof uet=='function'){uet(a);};
        if(b.e){amznJQ.completedStage(b.e);};
        if(typeof P != 'undefined'){P.register(b.p);};
    }
}

    var b=CSMReqs[marker];

        if(window.ue &amp;&amp; typeof ue.tag === 'function') {
            ue.tag(customtag);
        }
    }
};

   !   -   -       n   a   v   -   c   o   n   f   i   g   -   a   s   s   e   t   -   i   n   j   e   c   t   i   o   n       G   B   :   :   d   e   s   k   t   o   p   :   :   s   t   a   n   d   a   r   d   :   :   5   3   1   5   4   :   C   &amp;5   3   3   4   1   :   T   1   &amp;5   4   4   7   6   :   C   :   :   a   u   i   D   e   b   u   g   =   0   :   :   i   s   S   e   c   u   r   e   =   0       n   a   v   c   -   4   z   X   a   A   t   I   t   I   K   n   L   7   Z   b   X   q   K   A   W   m   7   P   t   u   9   w   s   l   5   b   S   U   6   7   G   o   d   U   I   C   6   D   H   m   2   T   /   t   6   P   k   b   N   J   Z   J   h   W   Y   v   P   Z   G   i   p   x   z   2   S   m   F   H   O   A   =       r   i   d   -   J   T   1   E   8   3   F   N   8   C   F   F   M   Q   5   Q   T   P   4   F       s   e   q   -   2   1   3       (   M   o   n       J   u   l       1   3       1   8   :   1   4   :   2   8       2   0   1   5   )       *   *   C   A   C   H   E   D   -   B   Y   -   N   C   C   C   *   *       -   -   &gt;

   n   e   w       p   )   ;   i   f   (   b   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r   )   {   v   a   r       v   ;   b   .   a   d   d   E   v   e   n   t   L   i   s   t   e   n   e   r   (   "   D   O   M   C   o   n   t   e   n   t   L   o   a   d   e   d   "   ,   v   =   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )   {   o   .    /   /   L   o   c   a   l   l   y       o   v   e   r   r   i   d   e

   s   c   r   i   p   t       l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   =   "   J   a   v   a   S   c   r   i   p   t   "       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   J   a   v   a   S   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;

O   v   b   1   6   R   1   T   G   Q   /   2   8   0   -   9   8   5   9   2   4   9   -   6   8   2   8   8   0   2   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   B   0   0   S   P   H   C   7   E   W   &amp;c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   B   0   0   S   P   H   C   7   E   W   &amp;e   m   a   i   l   C   a   p   t   i   o   n   S   t   r   I   D   =   &amp;e   m   a   i   l   C   u   s   t   o   m   M   s   g   S   t   r   I   D   =   &amp;e   m   a   i   l   D   e   s   c   S   t   r   I   D   =   &amp;e   m   a   i   l   S   u   b   j   e   c   t   S   t   r   I   D   =   &amp;e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;f   o   r   c   e   S   p   r   i   t   e   s   =   1   &amp;i   d   =   B   0   0   S   P   H   C   7   E   W   &amp;i   m   a   g   e   U   R   L   =   &amp;i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;i   s   E   m   a   i   l   =   0   &amp;l   e   a   r   n   M   o   r   e   B   u   t   t   o   n   =   &amp;m   e   r   c   h   a   n   t   I   D   =   &amp;p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   B   0   0   S   P   H   C   7   E   W   &amp;p   l   a   c   e   m   e   n   t   I   D   =   d   p   _   e   -   .                            ,       c   l   o   s   e   T   e   x   t   :       "   C   l   o   s   e   "   ,       i   s   C   o   m   p   a   c   t   :   f   a   l   s   e       ,       t   o   k   e   n   :       "   B   C   1   C   E   A   4   D   0   E   9   B   8   6   2   0   5   9   2   C   F   2   3   F   C   E   B   B   9   F   1   F   F   2   C   F   9   8   7   1   "   }   ;   
                           a   m   z   _   t   a   f   _   t   r   i   g   g   e   r   s   .   s   w   f   t   e   x   t       =       p   o   p   o   v   e   r   P   a   r   a   m   s   ;

                                                   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   d   a   t   a   )       {   
                                                                   i   f       (   d   a   t   a   .   e   r   r   o   r       =   =   =       0   )       {   
                                                                                   j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   '   #   p   u   b   d   a   t   e   l   a   b   e   l   '   )   .   h   t   m   l   (   d   a   t   a   .   l   a   b   e   l   )   ;   
                                                                                   j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   '   #   p   u   b   d   a   t   e   v   a   l   u   e   '   )   .   h   t   m   l   (   d   a   t   a   .   v   a   l   u   e   )   ;   
                                                                   }   
                                                                   j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   '   #   b   o   o   k   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   '   )   .   s   h   o   w   (   )   ;   
                                                   }   
                   }   )   ;   
           }   )   ;   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

                                   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   p   1   3   n   -   n   o   n   A   U   I   -   s   h   o   v   e   l   e   r       a   u   i   T   e   s   t   W   r   a   p   p   e   r       s   i   m   s   W   r   a   p   p   e   r       p   1   3   n   -   n   o   n   A   U   I   -   s   h   o   v   e   l   e   r   "       d   a   t   a   -   p   1   3   n   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   -   n   a   m   e   =   "   p   d   _   s   i   m   _   3   5   1   "       d   a   t   a   -   p   1   3   n   -   g   l   o   b   a   l   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   m   a   r   k   e   t   p   l   a   c   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   G   B   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   r   e   q   u   e   s   t   I   d   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   1   5   6   G   R   Y   1   Y   T   4   G   G   Q   7   H   E   2   Y   2   F   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   m   a   r   k   e   t   p   l   a   c   e   I   d   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   A   1   F   8   3   G   8   C   2   A   R   O   7   P   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   ,   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   s   e   s   s   i   o   n   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   2   8   0   -   9   8   5   9   2   4   9   -   6   8   2   8   8   0   2   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   }   "       d   a   t   a   -   w   i   d   g   e   t   N   a   m   e   =   "   p   u   r   c   h   a   s   e   "   &gt;   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   h   o   v   e   l   e   r   "       i   d   =   "   p   u   r   c   h   a   s   e   S   h   v   l   "   &gt;
